Faith Goldy outraged both Christians and Muslims when she went to Bethlehem and called for a new Crusade. ,#,topoli,http://www.,middleeasteye.net/news/palestini,an-christians-respond-canadian-journalists-viral-islamophobic-video-70497593, ,…
